original_text: And Moses and Aaron went into the tabernacle of the congregation, and came out, and blessed the people: and the glory of the Lord appeared unto all the people.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 회막에 들어갔다가 나와서 백성에게 축복하매 여호와의 영광이 온 백성에게 나타나며

sentences.original_text: Moses and Aaron went into the tabernacle of the congregation
the glory of the Lord appeared unto all the people
